SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_authorization_id, claim_id, authorization_number, service_center_id, service_level_id, claim_authorization_status_id, special_instruction, visit_date, device_reception_date, expected_repair_date, repair_date, pick_up_date, delivery_date, who_pays_id, defect_reason, technical_report, batch_number, svc_reference_number, external_created_date, is_special_service_id, reverse_logistics_id, problem_found, source, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, hist_created_by, hist_created_date, hist_modified_by, hist_modified_date, verification_number, claim_auth_history_id FROM elp_claim_auth_history WHERE claim_auth_history_id = :claim_auth_history_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT claim_authorization_id, claim_id, authorization_number, service_center_id, service_level_id, claim_authorization_status_id, special_instruction, visit_date, device_reception_date, expected_repair_date, repair_date, pick_up_date, delivery_date, who_pays_id, defect_reason, technical_report, batch_number, svc_reference_number, external_created_date, is_special_service_id, reverse_logistics_id, problem_found, source, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, hist_created_by, hist_created_date, hist_modified_by, hist_modified_date, verification_number, claim_auth_history_id FROM elp_claim_auth_history WHERE claim_authorization_id = :claim_authorization_id
